Scratch Desktop for Windows96

Note: This project is NOT endorsed, supported, or affiliated in any way by the Scratch Team OR MIT Media Lab.

This is an UNOFFICIAL port of Scratch and in no way is associated with the Scratch Team or MIT Media Lab.



How to use

Use like an official version of Scratch, except this version isn't official.

Command Line Switiches

Scratch Desktop for Windows96 can take multiple paramaters:

scratch-desktop C:/path/to/project.sb3 Load a project automatically

scratch-desktop tutorial=tutorial-id Start a tutorial automatically

Tutorial IDs (command line switches)

get-started Getting Started

imagine-world Imagine a World

anim-talk Create Animations that Talk

talking-tales Talking Tales

anim-name Animate a Name

make-music Make Music

create-story Create a Story

chase-game Make a Chase Game

anim-char Animate a Character

clickr-game Make a Clicker Game

make-fly Make it Fly

pong-game Pong Game

video-sensr Video Sensing

add-spr Add a Sprite

add-bkd Add a Backdrop

change-size Change Size

glide-around Glide Around

record-snd Record a Sound

make-spin Make it Spin

hide-show Hide and Show

anim-spr Animate a Sprite

arrow-ky Use Arrow Keys

vis-fx Add Effects

Need help?

When you install this, it comes with Help Topcis!
